DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine treatment increase bone mineral density Japanese woman postmenopausal osteoporosis .
DOC.brief_title: Study With AMG 785 Treat Japanese Women With Postmenopausal Osteoporosis
DOC.criteria: Ambulatory , postmenopausal Japanese woman osteoporosis ( define low bone mineral density ) Severe osteoporosis Use agent affect bone metabolism History metabolic bone disease ( except osteoporosis ) Vitamin D insufficiency ( vitamin D repletion rescreening permit ) Current hyper hypocalcemia Current , uncontrolled hyper hypothyroidism Current , uncontrolled hyper hypoparathyroidism
DOC.keyword: Osteoporosis , Osteoporosis-Postmenopausal , Bone Diseases-Metabolic , Bone Diseases , Musculoskeletal Diseases
